title: Pool Party Skis Sales

embed.description: Check out all the champs and skins that'll be on sale this June. Like previous sales schedules, we're not posting the exact dates for each champ and skin, but they'll all be on sale sometime next month, so keep an eye out.

body:
This week has Pool Party Lee Sin come on sale.

In the coming month (June) Leona and Grave's Pool Party Skin will be on sale.

Grab' em!

replies.body: None. As much as PP Renekton is funny I like Galactic. As for the other skins I have a Poppy skin but since she's getting a Sion soon I'll get Battle Regalia because it too looks cool (and it would be just like Riot to make Blacksmith Poppy look like complete shit afterwards as they have with all the other skins I have of champions that got a visual update.

Warmonger Sion looks so bad too.
IMHO Default Sion skin is the best.
But if playing against a Maokai, pick Lumberjack Sion.
lol. Funnily enough Mao was one of the  cases where I erred on the side of caution and chose not to buy a skin. AND WHAT DO YOU KNOW Charred looks like crap now...
